title: Lists
mission_log: We intercepted encrypted messages. Extract clues from the list.
challenge: Given messages = ["alpha", "beta", "gamma"], print the second message.
starter_code:
# Extract the second message
messages = ["alpha", "beta", "gamma"]

# Print the second message (beta)
print()
hints: Lists start counting at 0. So: messages[0]="alpha", messages[1]="beta", messages[2]="gamma"
To get the second item (beta), use messages[1]
